name: chilan-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder would take normal-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a Normal-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s Normal-type attack.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s Normal-type attack.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s Normal-type attack.
